title: Aliens.Colonial.Marines.Collectors.Edition.Multi6-PROPHET
description:
Aliens: Colonial Marines - Collectors Edition (c) SEGA
release date ...: January 2767
protection .....: Steam + CEG
# of discs .....: 1
languages ......: EN/FR/DE/IT/ES/PL
---------------------------------------------------

You and your friends are the deadliest killers in
the galaxy. Another glorious day in the Corps.
Buckle up, soldier! Welcome to Aliens: Colonial
Marines. Created by Gearbox, the critically
acclaimed and fan-favourite developers of
Borderlands and Brothers In Arms, you and your
friends will become the most badass military outfit
in the galaxy the US Colonial Marines. It's up to
you to not just survive, but wipe out the Xeno
infestation.

This Collectors Edition includes:

* Plasma Pulse Rifle
* Sonic Electronic Ball Breakers
* US Colonial Marines Academy firing range

We have also included all the other DLC content
released so far:

* Bug Hunt DLC
* Limited Edition Pack
* SHARP Sticks
* Reconnaissanse DLC
* Movie Map Pack
* Stasis Interrupted
* Sawed-off Double Barrel Shotgun

So if the game deloper does not release any more
DLC content for this game we can call this release
as the Complete Edition. Game is also updated to
v1.4.0.

1- Unpack, burn or mount
2- Install the game
3- Copy the cracked content from PROPHET dir to
<installdir>BinariesWin32 folder
4- Go To Hell!
